蟕字的基本解释

蟕
zuī
〔蟕蠵（
x?）〕古书上说的一种大龟。

蟕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zuī］
［《集韻》遵爲切，平支，莊。］
见“蟕蠵”。

蟕字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蟕； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1096第33
【集韻】津垂切，音厜。【類篇】蟕蠵，龜屬。【爾雅·釋魚註】涪陵郡出大龜，甲可以卜，緣中文似瑇瑁，俗呼爲靈龜，卽今蟕蠵龜。【本草】蟕蠵，生海邊，甲有文，堪爲物飾。　又【類篇】遵爲切，音檇。義同。或作?、觜。

蟕字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
蟕字的起名意思

暂无。

蟕
Basic explanation of words
蟕
zuī
〔蟕蟕蟕（
x?)] a kind of big tortoise mentioned in ancient books.
蟕
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zuī］
["Ji Yun" Zun is cut, flat branch, Zhuang. ]
See "蟕蟕蟕".
蟕
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蟕; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1096 Page 33
[Jiyun] Jin cut down and sounded. [Class articles] Loggerhead loggerhead, turtle genus. [Erya·Shiyu's Note] There are big tortoises in Fuling County. The armor can be used for divination. The origin is Chinese like 瑇瑁, and it is commonly called ling tortoise. [Materia Medica] loggerheads, born on the seashore, with writing, worthy of ornaments.　[Classes] Zun is cut, sound 檇. The same meaning. Or for?, 觜.
